name: Kalpesh Singh
body:
### HELLO THERE!
I am a young, ambitious and passionate about software design, UX, UI, graphic, social media & web design. A professional IT engineer, ethical, always happy to help and one who never stop learning. Business strategy, technical writing as well color and layout have always been my strong suit.

I love to write on the web and graphic designs and contributor to numerous websites. My craze about PHP has started after getting certified in PHP and pushed my PHP skills during my first internship with First North Global, NJ, USA.

### WHAT I TASTE:

A. WEB DESIGN
* I enticed towards web design in 2009 when I was in sophomore. I have begun with the help of WYSIWYG web design software.

B. WRITING
* Started writing in late December of 2012
* First article was published on 7PlusDezine
* Yet write and improving my writing skills

C. PHP & MySQL
* Fallen in love with PHP and MySQL during my web development training and pushed my PHP limits during my first internship as a PHP developer. Still love this technology!

D. UX & UI
* I have special affection towards User Interface and Experience
* Working towards improving user experience in mobile and desktop apps

E. JOOMLA
* I have learnt basic of Joomla while designing my personal website. My learning participation was very absorbing with Joomla and would like to be pro in this technology.

### HEY! DON'T BE SHY
You can visit [my personal website](knowkalpesh.in) or follow me on [Twitter](twitter.com/knowkalpesh)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
